quote: Hurt shouldn’t pile up like this inside of someone. No one should suffocate beneath pain on top of pain. You should have time to breathe, time to scream it out until it doesn’t exist anymore.
quote_letters: HURT SHOULDNT PILE UP LIKE THIS INSIDE OF SOMEONE NO ONE SHOULD SUFFOCATE BENEATH PAIN ON TOP OF PAIN YOU SHOULD HAVE TIME TO BREATHE TIME TO SCREAM IT OUT UNTIL IT DOESNT EXIST ANYMORE
